statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT location, membership_status FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_date FROM customer_demographics WHERE churn_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, location ASC
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Male' AND location='New York'
SELECT customer_id, gender, location, membership_status FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE membership_status='Gold' ORDER BY churn_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM customer_demographics
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, customer_segment FROM customers ORDER BY customer_segment DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_result, prediction_date FROM churn_prediction WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' OR gender='Other' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_result='Churn' AND confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.name, c.location, cp.prediction_result FROM customers c INNER JOIN churn_prediction cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.confidence_level > 0.5 ORDER BY cp.confidence_level DESC;

SELECT c.name, c.age, c.location, cp.prediction_result, cp.confidence_level FROM customers c LEFT JOIN churn_prediction cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE c.age < 50 ORDER BY c.age ASC, cp.prediction_result;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM churn_prediction WHERE churn_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM retention_strategies WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, churn_probability FROM churn_prediction WHERE churn_probability BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age ASC, annual_income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, churn_probability FROM churn_prediction WHERE churn_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY churn_probability DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_id, gender, city, churn_probability FROM customer_demographics INNER JOIN churn_prediction ON customer_demographics.customer_id = churn_prediction.customer_id WHERE age <= 40 ORDER BY churn_probability DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender, location FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 AND product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, satisfaction_level FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' OR interaction_type = 'Phone'
SELECT * FROM churn_predictions WHERE churn_probability >= 0.5 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC

SELECT c.name, p.amount, i.interaction_type, cp.churn_probability FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN churn_predictions cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE c.age > 30 AND cp.churn_probability BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT prediction_score, prediction_date FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_score > 0.8;
SELECT behavior_score, behavior_timestamp FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_description FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_type='Email Campaign';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='F' AND age > 30;
SELECT behavior_type, MAX(behavior_score) FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type;
SELECT * FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_score > 0.7 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_description FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_type='Email Campaign';
